synopsis.text: This anime follows the everyday life of Hiro Aida, a typical high school student navigating the complexities of adolescence alongside his friends. As they experience their first romantic encounters, they find themselves intertwined through a web of cell phone messages. With a diverse cast of five unique girls - Ichiru, Sayo, Miya, Momoka, and Ayano - each with their own quirks and interests, Hiro's journey to find romantic connection is filled with fun, confusion, and self-discovery. The anime consists of five regular episodes, each focusing on one of the girls, and concludes with an epilogue episode, offering a glimpse into the world of modern teenage romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
